text: Etot muzhchina vladeyet darom krasnorechiya i takimi sil'nymi dokazatel'stvami, chto privlekayet slushateley. On tak poritsal nashi ubezhdeniya, chto chut' ne otklonil nas ot nashikh bozhestv i chut' ne privlok nas k svoyemu Gospodu, yesli by my tvordo ne protivostoyali yemu i ne derzhalis' ikh i svoyey religii stoyko". Poistine, My pokazhem im (nevernym) istinu, kogda oni uvidyat karu za ikh deyaniya v Sudnyy den'. Togda oni uznayut, kto bol'she zabludilsya i sbilsya s pryamogo puti
